description: Nova can only display 25 images from glance because it does not understand how to do pagination. The Image Service needs to understand how to use marker and iterate until no images are returned.
title: Glance Image Service does not support pagination

comments.content: Nova can only display 25 images from glance because it does not understand how to do pagination. The Image Service needs to understand how to use marker and iterate until no images are returned.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: If the Nova code is using the Glance client, perhaps it would be better to return an iterator from client.get_images()?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes

comments.content: I thought that, but then we would have to change how the bin/glance pagination works. I'm just going to add similar logic here as I did in glance-cli-filters
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: OK, no worries. Was just a thought. :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaypipes
